title: Inception
description: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief, the absolute best in the dangerous art of extraction.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing methamphetamine.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Silence of the Lambs
description: A young woman is forced to seek help from a brilliant psychiatrist to catch a serial killer.
